thread.section_title: NOW FINANCE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NOW FINANCE | www.nowfinance.com.au
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: A week ago I was about to give up trying to get a Consolidation Loan. Having contacted numerous Banks etc. all to no avail. Then out of the blue I received a call from Carmel, and as they say the rest is history. Carmel was fantastic, within a few days thanks to Carmel and Now Finance I was able to obtain a Consolidation Loan. Every thing was completed on line and Carmel kept me informed with phone calls and emails every day on the progress of the loan. I would highly recommend Carmel and the team from Now Finance with out any hesitation. Thank you again Carmel.
